column4: Hello, my appearence settings doesn't get saved. Everytime I reboot/login I see old theme.  But when I open the appearace settings applet, the desktop theme changes promptly. how do I make the change saved persistantly???
sorry for the dumb question, but you aren't runnign off a cd are you?  once again, sorry for the dumb tech support question
My ubuntu is installed in harddisk. No Live CD is here.
ok. sorry, no idea.  sounds like something is screwed up.
